mapper.select: SELECT id AS id, user_id AS userId, name AS name, phone_number AS phoneNumber, age AS age, sex AS sex, address AS address, industry AS industry, remark AS remark FROM user_info WHERE user_id = #{userId} effective = '1'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_info ( user_id, name, phone_number, effective ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{name}, #{phoneNumber}, '1' );
mapper.update: UPDATE user_info SET name = #{name}, age = #{age}, sex = #{sex}, address = #{address}, industry = #{industry}, remark = #{remark} WHERE id = #{id};
